snippet: Despite an international battle for preservation that lasted more than five years, the former United States Navy destroyer John Rodgers finally fell victim to the ravages of seawater and good intentions gone awry.
abstract: Despite an international battle for preservation that lasted more than five years, the former United States Navy destroyer John Rodgers finally fell victim to the ravages of seawater and good intentions gone awry.

headline.main: A World War II Destroyer's Demise in Mexico
